reviewtext: I got the Panasonic RP-HT21 headphones to use with my lightweight laptop because I don't like using in ear phones for video which might have varying volume levels.I was delightfully surprised by the full sound quality of these inexpensive and very lightweight headphones.  I am not an audiophile by any means but my husband, who is more conscious of sound quality, was also impressed with them and so I ordered a second pair for him.  I'm happy to add a five star review to this product.
